content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although fictional circumstances portray me as an unscrupulous landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price for this ideal apartment in Magdeburg. Keep in mind we'll ignore the background details as we negotiate. Now, propose a price to start the conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Let's start with 450 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

If you agree to this price, I'll gladly show you the way forward with the lease agreement.

Let us continue to negotiate with an open mind, perhaps finding a compromise around my initial ask of 520 Euros or slightly adjusting it.

content: I understand your point of view. Considering your initial offer and the market price in the city center, I suggest 500 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for both parties.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
